#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int A[100001],N,i,j,T;
	
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&N);
		cin>>A[0];
		for(i=1; i<N; i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&A[i]);
			if(i%2!=0)
			{
				if(A[i]<A[i-1])
				{
					j=A[i];
					A[i]=A[i-1];
					A[i-1]=j;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if(A[i]>A[i-1])
				{
					j=A[i];
					A[i]=A[i-1];
					A[i-1]=j;
				}
			}
		}
		
		for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			printf("%d ",A[i]);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	
	return 0;
}
